pathAssistantSteps.info: This status value can only be set once the 'Summary' and the 'Next Steps' fields have been filled in. As soon as this status value is set, further editing is no longer possible.
This status value is initially set when a new visit is recorded in the system. All mandatory fields have to be filled in.
This status value is automatically set as soon as the date in the field 'Visit Date End' is expired.
